name: Misty Dungeon
description:
Your job is to get as deep into the dungeon as possible.

Controls:

Attack by walking along the sides of hexagons or directly towards an enemy. Avoid warrior skeletons, archers and spell-traps.

In the bar to the left you can use your abilities: Extended Vision, Teleportation and a Shield, each of them with a unique cooldown length.

How deep can you get?

Gamejam project from the GDS Summerjam 2022

Nils Hönnerscheid: Art, Story, Gamedesign

Tobias Thielen: Programming, Gamedesign
